thread.title: Skal condemns Bangkok bombing

author: eTN Editor
title: Skal condemns Bangkok bombing
text:
Aug 21, 2015 eTN   
The President of Skal Internationa, V. Salih Cene, issued the following statement regarding the terroristic attacks in Thailand: 
On behalf of the EC, I strongly condemn the brutal bomb attack in Bangkok and despise all terrorism that is inhuman and evil. 
We share the agony and deep sorrow of the people of Thailand as well as our Skal friends. 
Our condolences and prayers are with the families of the deceased and wounded. 
May God protect the people of Thailand from any such brutal action in the future.
